'''The Adra Realm''' is a [[Pillars of Eternity II: Deadfire world map|location]] in {{poe2}}.

==Background==
This otherworldly place represents the soul space within the massive pillar of luminous [[adra]] at the heart of the Engwithan station at [[Poko Kohara]]. The corruption of the pillar is a physical manifestation of the decay within this realm, brought upon by the souls trapped within by [[Anahāru]].

==Points of interest==
* This is a small area within the pillar. You confront Anaharu among the lovely corruption blooming within.

==Characters==
* [[Anahāru]]
* [[Beza]]
